pr_title: Add `slowTraceSegmentThreshold` to forcibly sample slow traces

timeline.message: `slowTraceSegmentThreshold` is for you to open force save some slow trace segment when sampling mechanism active.When sampling mechanism activated, this config would make the slow trace segment sampled, ignoring the sampling rate.

timeline.author: kezhenxu94

replies.bodyText: hello, provider.getModuleConfig().getSlowTraceSegmentThreshold() is module config value, watcher can't change it. watcher has it own value.
